short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Seamlessly integrates with google search to show npm packages and installation commands to copy.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Be productive while coding. Save time while setting up new projects.

‚≠êCORE FEATURE‚≠ê
- Get all related package names directly in your google search results.
- Get commands to install those packages and type definition one click away.
- Get these install commands in your favorite package manager yarn/npm.
- Want more documentation? Get links to npm page, github/repo page and homepage for that package in your google search results.

üöÄRoadmapüöÄ 
There are many enhancements that can be added to extension. So candidate features are
- Show github/npm stats like weekly downloads.
- Add comparison feature to compare similar packages
